content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: HELLO LITTLE ONE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: I AM GLAD TO SEE YOU.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: I AM GLAD YOU HAVE COME TO ASK ME.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IT IS A MOST FORTUNATE OUTCOME.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THE ONE THAT I HAD HOPED FOR.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: AM I AM PLEASED TO SEE IT COME ABOUT.

content.name: {player}
content.dialogue: ...Thanks.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: OF COURSE LITTLE ONE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: YOUR JOY IS MY JOY. FOR WE SHALL BE BOUND TOGETHER.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: HELD AS ONE. ENDURING SIDE BY SIDE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: CAN YOU BEGIN TO IMAGINE IT?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THE WAY ETERNITY WILL STRETCH BEFORE YOU.

content.name: {player}
content.dialogue: I...I think so.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THAT IS GOOD TO HEAR.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: COME, COME, WE MUST BEGIN YOUR TRANSFORMATION.

content.name: {player}
content.dialogue: ...Transformation?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: YES, YES. INTO ONE OF MY KIND.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THAT IS HOW I SHARE MY FOREVER WITH MY CHOSEN LOVE

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: YOU WILL BECOME ONE OF MY KIND, OF COURSE.

content.name: {player}
content.dialogue: Of course. Your kind.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: YES, THOSE OF US WHO FLOAT ON THE FLOW OF TIME.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: UNAGING. UNFADING. UNENDING.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: UNCHANGING.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IS IT NOT A WONDERFUL THOUGHT?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: TO KNOW YOU WILL BE AS YOU ARE

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: AND BE LOVED AS YOU ARE

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THROUGH ALL THE AGES OF THIS UNIVERSE?

content.name: {player}
content.dialogue: ...I guess?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: YOU SEEM UNSURE, LITTLE ONE?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: DO YOU NOT DESIRE STASIS? AMBER-PRESERVED EONS?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: DOES THE THOUGHT OF IT TROUBLE YOU?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IT IS UNDERSTANDABLE IF IT DOES.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: YOUR MIND IS NOT YET MEANT TO UNDERSTAND IT.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: BUT IT WILL BE EQUIPPED TO SOON.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THAT IS, IF YOU STILL WANT TO BIND YOURSELF TO ME..

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: BUT IF MY LOVE ISN'T WORTH THE TOLL

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: PERHAPS YOU WOULD BE BETTER OFF TO TRY AGAIN

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: AND YET HERE YOU ARE, BARING YOUR SOUL?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IF THAT IS WHAT YOU'RE DOING.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: WE'VE KNOWN EACH OTHER FOR SUCH LITTLE TIME.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: HOW CAN YOU KNOW THIS IS WHAT YOU WANT?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: BUT OF COURSE, YOU DON'T KNOW WHAT YOU WANT.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: DO YOU, LITTLE ONE?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: YOU HAVE NO CLUE WHAT YOU'RE LOOKING FOR.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: HOW VERY HUMAN OF YOU.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: YOUR KIND PRAISES VULNERABILITY, LAUDS IT.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: DO YOU, REALLY? DO YOU HAVE THE STRENGTH TO BE VULNERABLE?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: I DON'T THINK SO.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IF YOU DO, I HAVE NOT OBSERVED IT.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: GO AHEAD. ASK YOUR QUESTION.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: I CAN GUARANTEE YOU WON'T LIKE THE ANSWER.

content.name: {player}
content.dialogue: Why?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: YOUR LIFE MAY BE SHORT, LITTLE ONE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: BUT MINE STRETCHES LONGER THAN YOU CAN EVEN IMAGINE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: YOU WANT A LOVE THAT'S ETERNAL, CORRECT?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: WHAT MAKES YOU THINK YOU'RE WORTH MY ETERNITY?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: YOU ARE NOTHING TO ME, LITTLE ONE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: A GRAIN OF SAND ON THE VAST BEACH OF THE UNIVERSE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IF YOU WANT TO CONVINCE ME OTHERWISE, YOU'LL HAVE TO TRY AGAIN.
